thread.title: Earnings estimates are off the charts this season, says Belpointe's David Nelson.

title: Earnings estimates are off the charts this season, says Belpointe's David Nelson.
text:
Earnings estimates are off the charts this season, says Belpointe's David Nelson.   03:34 
People got excited about tax cuts, but earnings are a mixed bag, with banks doing good, and tech disappointing, says David Nelson, Chief Strategist at Belpointe Asset Management. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
